name: Diet for Fitness Training.
short_des: Making the commitment to exercise regularly is a terrific start to getting fit. However, without sound nutritional guidance, achieving your goals may be impossible. Tough workouts demand the right kind of fuel — and that fuel comes from the foods and beverages you consume.

name: FITNESS MOTIVATION
short_des: GET A WORKOUT PARTNER. Meeting up with friends at the gym is an exciting way to catch up and hang out, all while getting in shape.TRACK YOUR PROGRESS. GIVE YOURSELF A REAL REWARD. TALK WITH SOMEONE WHO DID IT. CHANGE UP YOUR ROUTINE

name: Simple Tips for Fitness Success
short_des: Exercise Daily. Exercise daily for at least an hour.Eat the Right Foods and Portion Each Meal. No matter how bad your stomach is telling you to go for candy over healthy food, try to stay away from sweets.Keep Track of Calories and Food Intake Per Day.Be Sure to Get Sleep

name: How do you show leadership in the gym?
short_des: Make a genuine effort to know your people.Make others accountable by giving them your trust.Ask for input on the decision, even if you didn't make it.Remain calm in stressful situations—and delegate.Inspire.

name: Gym time management skills
short_des: Record Your Current Schedule.Make a List.Use a Tickler File. Use 30 Minutes at the Start of Every Day to Schedule.Take Advantage of the Paret Principle Schedule Time for Interruptions.Complete Your Most Important Tasks First.Deadlines Throughout the Day.

name: Gym health and safety regulations
short_des: Form, form, form. A general rule of weight training is form before weight.Use a spotter or gym partner.Stay hydrated.Be aware of your surroundings.Put your weights back.Always use a towel.Warm-up.Take your time.
